description: '''Bùi Thị Bích Phương''' (born 30 September 1989, in [[Quảng Ninh province|Quang Ninh]]), better known as '''Bích Phương''' is a [[V-pop|Vietnamese pop music]] singer. She entered the entertainment industry as a contestant of Season 3 of ''[[Vietnam Idol (season 3)|Vietnam Idol]]'' in 2010, and has since been  established as one of Vietnam's most popular singers of the 2010s.
